title: How to activate hold for me?
content: I have the Pixel 4XL and have phone app version 58.0.346367036-publicbeta. I don't see hold for me on the settings list. I have the December Security patch as well, and have also tried the non-beta version of the phone app with no success there as well.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
